senses.de: To admit that something you said or did was wrong
senses.ex: I was wrong to accuse him of cheating, and I should take back what I said.

Tips.title: Apology Required
Tips.description: Use 'take back' when you want to apologize and show you regret saying something.
Tips.example: I take back my earlier comments; I spoke out of turn.

Tips.title: Strong Emotion
Tips.description: 'Take back' implies strong emotions such as embarrassment or guilt related to what was said.
Tips.example: I take back my words; they were hurtful and I'm deeply sorry.

Tips.title: Public Correction
Tips.description: Saying 'take back' in public can show a willingness to correct oneself openly.
Tips.example: In today's meeting, I need to take back my previous statement.

senses.ex: After the divorce, she decided to take back all the things she had given him.

Tips.title: Personal Possessions
Tips.description: Use 'take back' to refer to physical items you want returned to you.
Tips.example: I lent you my book last month; I'd like to take it back now.

Tips.title: Intact Relationships
Tips.description: Sentimental items are often involved when 'taking back' from relationships that ended.
Tips.example: She took back the photo album from her ex-boyfriend.

senses.de: To accept someone again after they have been rejected
senses.ex: Even after all he has done, I still love him and am ready to take him back.

Tips.title: Relationship Restore
Tips.description: Use 'take back' when someone is allowed back into a personal relationship.
Tips.example: He made a mistake, but I've decided to take him back.

Tips.title: Conditional Return
Tips.description: Taking someone back might be under certain conditions or after changes are made.
Tips.example: She'll take him back if he promises to be honest.

senses.de: To remind one of a past time or era
senses.ex: Visiting my childhood neighborhood really takes me back.

Tips.title: Nostalgic Expression
Tips.description: Use 'take back' when something evokes a strong, usually pleasant, memory of the past.
Tips.example: This song really takes me back to my high school days.

Tips.title: Emotional Journey
Tips.description: Describes an emotional return to a previous time in your life.
Tips.example: Looking through these old photos takes me back to when I was a child.
